body:
I would leave the state management of the input to the browser. This gives a better user experience (no rerendering or losing of focus). You can access the current value via the event. This means you can remove the `:on-change` event
```clojure
save! (fn [event]
        (let [new-title (-> event .-target .-value)]
          (dispatch [:node/rename (:current-title @s) event-title])
          (swap! s assoc
                 :editing false
                 :current-title new-title)))
cancel! (fn [] (swap! s assoc :editing false))
